name: Delicious Quest
description:
Delicious Quest is a game about a dog on his journey to find the Holy Roast Turkey. Unfortunately, this dog can't control himself and will require your help to go further in his epic quest !

Use the available objects to block his path, make him jump and bounce ! Avoid the traps to guide him through the dungeon.

Delicious Quest has been made by Eloïse Zirotti and Robin Six. An upgrade of the game is planned with more levels, general upgrades, bugs fix and audio ! Thanks a lot for playing :D
